heroLanding.title: Unleash the Potential of Web3 dApps
heroLanding.introPara: Experience the transformative power of blockchain technology through revolutionary applications that are reshaping various industries. Uncover the forefront of innovation and witness the game-changing potential of blockchain in action.

heroCards.heading: Ecosystem
heroCards.paragraph: Discover the various components of the blockchain ecosystem.

heroCards.heading: Developers
heroCards.paragraph: Learn how to build your own blockchain applications.

heroCards.heading: Learning
heroCards.paragraph: Find the tools and resources you need to get started.
